Notation Legend:
[X] = palm mute
/ = slide up
\\ = slide down  
h = hammer-on
p = pull-off
~ = vibrato
+ = harmonic
x = mute note

Note: The outro features improvised guitar work. 
This is a complex song with intricate rhythmic patterns and 
detailed fretboard positions for both guitars.
